PC Place Nigeria is one of the best place to buy Laptops, Desktops, Printers, Servers, Gadgets and Accessories in Nigeria.

PC Place Nigeria is where you can Buy Laptops, computer, Desktops, Printers, Gadgets, Servers and Accessories online dealing with all brands HP, Dell, Lenovo, Acer, Microsoft and so on in Nigeria. PC Place Ng is your No. 1 Online Laptop Store in Nigeria selling to companies, organizations, individuals. You can visit our head office at No.8 Shogunle Close, off Anthony Village, Behind Eko Hospital, Ikeja, Lagos.

Shop Wide Range of Products

As the leading online store for laptops and electronics in Nigeria, We offers a vast array of products (laptops, desktops, tablets, smartphones, computer accessories, audio devices, gaming equipment, home appliances and much more.) to cater to the diverse needs and preferences of our customers.

Shop Quality and Authenticity

At PC PLACE NG, quality is our utmost priority. We partner directly with renowned brands Like HP, Dell, Lenovo, Acer, Asus etc, to ensure that all our products are genuine and of the highest quality.

Competitive Pricing and Discounts

We believe in providing the best value to our customers. PC Place Nigeria offers competitive prices on all our products, making it affordable for individuals and businesses that like to purchase their desired laptops and electronics.

Dedicated Customer Support

We take pride in our exceptional customer service. Our team of knowledgeable and friendly representatives is available to assist you with any inquiries or concerns you may have. You can reach us on WhatsApp with +2348022272222.

We hope these FAQs and their answers provide you with helpful information about PC PLACE NIGERIA. If you have any additional questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our customer support.
